capability.name: Corporate Relationship
capability.definition: The Corporate Relationship capability manages relationships with key corporate parties including major clients, political and industry groups, and user associations to develop and maintain strategic business partnerships.
capability.role: Manage corporate relationships with key parties such as major clients, political and industry groups, user associations etc.
capability.example: A regular relationship review is scheduled with a major multinational customer to develop business opportunities

key_features.name: Corporate relationship management planning
